text: Fagus ferruginea may refer to one of the beech species: * Fagus ferruginea Dryand., a synonym for Fagus grandifolia subsp. grandifolia (American beech) * Fagus ferruginea var. caroliniana Loudon, also a synonym for Fagus grandifolia subsp. grandifolia * Fagus ferruginea Siebold (Invalid), a synonym for Fagus crenata Blume (Japanese beech) == References == *Fagus ferruginea The Plant List.
title: Fagus ferruginea
